name: Custom Component
description: Reusable ScriptComponent that can be attached to any entity
instructions:
1. Edit the component script to add your member variables and logic
2. Use [Attribute()] to expose configuration in Workbench
3. Override EOnInit for initialization, OnPostInit for post-setup
4. Override OnDelete for cleanup
5. Attach the component to entity prefabs via their 'components' block
6. Access the component at runtime: entity.FindComponent(YourComponent)
